fields.title: Welcome to Whole Life Journey
fields.summary: Get started with your personal life operating system for reflection, growth, and intentional living.
fields.content:
## What is Whole Life Journey?

Whole Life Journey is a **personal life operating system** that brings together the different dimensions of your life into one intelligent platform. Instead of using separate apps for journaling, health tracking, task management, and goalsâ€”WLJ connects everything so the AI can see the whole picture.

## Why This Matters

Most apps only see one part of your life. WLJ sees:
- **Your moods** from journaling
- **Your health patterns** from tracking
- **Your productivity** from tasks completed
- **Your spiritual journey** from faith tracking
- **Your intentions** from your stated goals

**The connection is the power.** When you journal about stress and the AI notices you also skipped workouts that week, it can make that connection for you.

## Getting Started

### 1. Check Your Dashboard Daily
Your Dashboard is home base. Even a 30-second glance keeps you connected to your goals and shows you what needs attention.

### 2. Start with One Module
Don't try to use everything at once. Pick what matters most:
- **Journaling** if you want self-awareness
- **Health** if you're focused on physical wellness
- **Faith** if you want to track your spiritual journey
- **Life** if you need task/project management

### 3. Enable AI Features
In Preferences, enable AI for personalized insights. The more data you provide, the smarter it gets.

### 4. Set Goals in Purpose
The Purpose module anchors everything. When the AI knows your goals, it can prioritize better.

## Core Features

| Module | What You Log | What You Get |
|--------|--------------|-------------|
| **Dashboard** | Nothingâ€”it aggregates | Daily insights, celebrations, nudges |
| **Journal** | Thoughts, moods | Emotional pattern analysis |
| **Health** | Weight, food, medicine, vitals | Health trend tracking |
| **Faith** | Prayers, scripture | Answered prayer history |
| **Life** | Tasks, projects, events | Productivity patterns |
| **Purpose** | Goals, direction | Drift detection, alignment |
| **Scan** | Photos of food, medicine | Instant data entry |

## Next Steps

1. **Customize Preferences** - Choose your theme, modules, and AI coaching style
2. **Write your first journal entry** - Build your streak
3. **Set your Purpose** - Annual direction and goals
4. **Enable SMS notifications** - For medicine and task reminders

fields.title: Journaling for Self-Awareness
fields.summary: Your journal powers AI insights about your emotional patterns, life rhythms, and personal growth.
fields.content:
## Why Journal in WLJ?

Your journal isn't just a diaryâ€”it's the **primary data source** for AI insights. Every entry teaches the system about:

- **Emotional patterns** - What triggers stress? What brings joy?
- **Life rhythms** - Busy seasons, restful periods
- **Growth** - How far you've come
- **Values** - What you write about reveals what matters

## The Dashboard Connection

When you journal consistently:
- Your **Daily Insight** becomes more relevant
- The AI notices **mood trends** you might miss
- Your **Journal Streak** tile celebrates consistency
- The Personal Assistant suggests **reflection prompts**

## Creating an Entry

1. Click **"New Entry"** from the Journal page
2. Enter a title (or leave blank for auto-date)
3. Select your current **mood**
4. Write your thoughts
5. (Optional) Add **categories**
6. Click **"Save"**

## Mood Tracking

Selecting your mood enables:
- Mood trend charts over time
- AI insights about emotional triggers
- Pattern detection (e.g., "You feel anxious on Mondays")

## What Your Journal Teaches the AI

| What You Write | What the AI Learns |
|----------------|--------------------|
| Daily moods | Emotional patterns |
| Challenges | Recurring struggles |
| Wins and gratitude | What brings you joy |
| Goals mentioned | Progress tracking |
| Relationships | Who matters to you |

## Tips for Powerful Journaling

1. **Same time daily** - Consistency builds the habit
2. **Three sentences count** - Perfection isn't required
3. **Be honest** - AI learns from authentic entries
4. **Review monthly** - See your own growth
5. **Use prompts** - Personal Assistant suggests topics

fields.title: Health Tracking Overview
fields.summary: Track weight, nutrition, medicine, vitals, and fitness to understand your physical wellness patterns.
fields.content:
## Why Track Health in WLJ?

**What gets measured gets managed.** But more importantly, when health data connects to your other data (journal moods, stress patterns, goal progress), you get insights no standalone health app can provide.

## Health Sub-Modules

### Weight Tracking
**Why:** See long-term trends, not daily noise
- Set goal weight in Preferences
- AI notices plateaus and progress
- Dashboard shows progress toward goal

### Nutrition / Food Tracking
**Why:** Understand what you eat
- Log meals manually or via Camera Scan
- Track calories and macros
- See patterns in eating behavior

### Medicine Tracking
**Why:** Never miss a dose
- Set up medication schedules
- One-tap daily check-off
- SMS reminders with quick-reply
- Refill alerts before you run out

### Vitals (Blood Pressure & SpO2)
**Why:** Monitor between doctor visits
- Automatic health categorization
- See trends over time
- Bring data to appointments

### Fasting
**Why:** Track intermittent fasting
- Start/end fasting windows
- View history and streaks
- SMS reminders for eating windows

### Fitness / Workouts
**Why:** Build exercise consistency
- Log workouts with templates
- Track weekly counts
- Dashboard shows "Workouts This Week"

### Medical Providers
**Why:** Organized healthcare contacts
- Store doctor/clinic info
- Patient portal URLs
- AI-assisted provider lookup

## The Dashboard Connection

Your health data powers:
- Weight progress bar toward goal
- Nutrition summary with macros
- Medicine status for today
- Fitness count for the week
- AI nudges when you haven't logged

## Tips for Better Health Tracking

1. **Log at consistent times** - Same time daily
2. **Use Camera Scan** - For quick food logging
3. **Enable SMS reminders** - For medicine adherence
4. **Set realistic goals** - In Preferences
5. **Check weekly trends** - More important than daily

fields.title: Faith Module: Tracking Your Spiritual Journey
fields.summary: Track prayers, scripture, and milestones to see God's faithfulness over time.
fields.content:

Faith isn't just about the present momentâ€”it's about **seeing God's faithfulness over time**. When you track prayers and mark them answered, you build a record of how God has moved in your life.

## The AI Connection

With Faith enabled:
- **Faith-first priorities** - The Personal Assistant prioritizes spiritual matters
- **Faith insights** - AI considers your spiritual journey in daily insights
- **Answered prayer celebrations** - Dashboard recognizes God's responses

## Faith Features

### Prayer Requests
**Why:** Never forget what you're praying for

1. Click **"New Prayer"**
2. Set priority (Normal or Urgent)
3. Mark **Answered** when God responds
4. View answered prayer history

**The power:** Months later, review answered prayers. You'll be amazed at patterns you forgot.

### Scripture
**Why:** Save verses that speak to you

- Search by reference
- Save with personal notes
- Organize by topic
- Review during difficult times

### Faith Milestones
**Why:** Mark spiritual turning points

- Salvation
- Baptism
- Answered prayers
- Spiritual insights
- Community moments

## Tips for Spiritual Growth

fields.title: Customizing Your Preferences
fields.summary: Personalize themes, modules, AI coaching styles, goals, and notifications.
fields.content:
## Why Preferences Matter

WLJ adapts to YOU, not the other way around. Your Preferences control:
- What you see (module toggles)
- How it looks (themes, colors)
- How the AI talks (coaching style)
- Your goals (weight, nutrition targets)
- Your notifications (SMS categories)

## Key Settings

### Theme & Appearance
- **Theme** - Minimal, Faith, Sports, Nature, Outdoors
- **Accent Color** - Custom highlight color
- **Dark/Light Mode** - System or manual

### Module Toggles
Disable what you don't need:
- Journal
- Faith
- Health
- Life
- Purpose

Disabled modules disappear from navigation.

### AI Settings
- **Enable AI** - For intelligent insights
- **Coaching Style** - How AI communicates:
  - Supportive Partner (warm)
  - Direct Coach (brief)
  - Gentle Guide (patient)
  - Wise Mentor (thoughtful)
  - Cheerful Friend (upbeat)
  - Calm Companion (steady)
  - Accountability Partner (focused)

### Personal Assistant
- Enable for AI-powered daily priorities
- Requires separate consent (deeper data access)

### Weight & Nutrition Goals
- Target weight with deadline
- Daily calorie goal
- Macro split (Protein/Carbs/Fat)
- Presets: Balanced, High Protein, Low Carb, Keto

### SMS Notifications
- Verify phone number
- Enable/disable by category
- Set quiet hours

### Timezone
- Set for accurate streaks and dates

## Tips for Optimal Settings

1. **Start with fewer modules** - Add more later
2. **Try different coaching styles** - Find what resonates
3. **Set realistic goals** - Better to exceed than constantly miss
4. **Enable Personal Assistant** - Most powerful feature
5. **Use SMS reminders** - Harder to ignore than app badges

fields.title: AI Coaching Styles Explained
fields.summary: Choose how the AI communicates with youâ€”from warm encouragement to direct accountability.
fields.content:
## Why Coaching Styles Matter

Different people respond to different communication styles. The AI coach adapts its tone based on your preference. This affects:
- Daily insights on your Dashboard
- Personal Assistant messages
- Reflection prompts
- Nudges and reminders

## Available Styles

### Supportive Partner
**Best for:** Those who thrive on encouragement

Warm and nurturing. Celebrates wins, provides gentle guidance during struggles. Uses affirming language.

### Direct Coach
**Best for:** Those who want efficiency

Brief and action-oriented. Gets straight to the point. No fluff, just clear instructions.

### Gentle Guide
**Best for:** Those who need patience

Calm and unhurried. Takes time to explain. Never rushes you. Supportive during setbacks.

### Wise Mentor
**Best for:** Those who value reflection

Thoughtful and philosophical. Offers wisdom. Encourages deeper thinking. Asks probing questions.

### Cheerful Friend
**Best for:** Those who want positivity

Upbeat and energetic. Keeps things fun. Focuses on bright sides. Uses enthusiasm.

### Calm Companion
**Best for:** Those who feel overwhelmed

Steady and peaceful. Grounding presence. Reduces anxiety. Never adds pressure.

### Accountability Partner
**Best for:** Those who need motivation

Direct about expectations. Celebrates effort. Pushes you forward. Holds you to commitments.

## How to Choose

1. Go to **Preferences > AI Settings**
2. Select your preferred style
3. Changes apply immediately

## Tips

- **Experiment** - Try different styles
- **Match your mood** - Some days need different energy
- **Consider your goals** - Weight loss might want accountability; stress management might want calm

fields.title: Why Can't I See Certain Features?
fields.summary: Features may be disabled in preferences or require specific settings to enable.
fields.content:
## Common Reasons Features Are Hidden

### Module Toggles
Features like Faith and Health are optional. Check **Preferences > Module Toggles** to enable them.

### AI Features Require Consent
AI-powered insights require:
1. AI enabled in Preferences
2. AI Data Consent given

### Personal Assistant Requires Extra Consent
The Personal Assistant needs:
1. AI Features enabled
2. AI Data Consent
3. Personal Assistant enabled
4. Personal Assistant consent

### SMS Requires Phone Verification
To use SMS notifications:
1. Enter phone number in Preferences
2. Receive and enter verification code
3. Enable SMS notifications
4. Accept SMS consent

### Faith Module Is Optional
The Faith module (prayers, scripture) must be enabled in Preferences. It's off by default for non-faith users.

### Sub-Navigation
Some features are in dropdowns:
- **Health** has sub-items (Medicine, Nutrition, Vitals, etc.)
- **Life** has sub-items (Tasks, Projects, Events, etc.)

## Still Can't Find It?

1. Check **Preferences** for module toggles
2. Ensure you've given required consents
3. Look in sub-navigation dropdowns
4. Use the Help chat to ask the assistant

fields.title: Goals and the Purpose Module
fields.summary: The Purpose module anchors everythingâ€”your goals tell the AI what matters most.
fields.content:
## Why Purpose Matters

Purpose is the **anchor** for everything in WLJ. Without it, you're just logging data. With it:
- Every task connects to a goal
- The AI detects drift from intentions
- Priorities align with what matters

## The Purpose Cascade

```
Annual Direction (your "why")
    â†“
Life Goals (what you want to achieve)
    â†“
Projects (in Life module)
    â†“
Tasks (daily actions)
```

The AI understands this hierarchy.

## Setting Annual Direction

1. **Word of the Year** - A guiding theme (e.g., "Growth", "Peace")
2. **Core Theme** - What you want to accomplish
3. **Focus Areas** - Key life domains to prioritize

## Creating Goals

1. Go to **Purpose > Goals**
2. Click **"New Goal"**
3. Enter title and description
4. Set target date (optional)
5. Choose category:
   - Health & Wellness
   - Personal Growth
   - Relationships
   - Career
   - Financial
   - Spiritual

## How the AI Uses Purpose

| What You Set | What the AI Does |
|--------------|------------------|
| Word of the Year | References in insights |
| Goals | Prioritizes related tasks |
| Change Intentions | Watches for drift |
| Focus Areas | Filters what matters |

## Tips

1. **Set Annual Direction first** - Everything flows from this
2. **Limit to 3-5 goals** - Focus beats breadth
3. **Review monthly** - Are you aligned?
4. **Connect to Life module** - Create projects from goals
5. **Journal about purpose** - Reflect on alignment

fields.title: Tasks, Projects, and the Life Module
fields.summary: The Life module is where intentions become action through tasks, projects, and events.
fields.content:
## Why Use the Life Module?

Life is where **intentions become action**. While Purpose holds goals, Life holds the daily tasks that achieve them.

## The Connection to Purpose

Ideal flow:
1. Set **Annual Direction** in Purpose
2. Create **Goals** that align
3. Break goals into **Projects** in Life
4. Break projects into **Tasks**
5. Complete tasks â†’ Projects complete â†’ Goals achieved

The AI sees this chain and helps you stay aligned.

## Life Features

### Tasks
**Why:** Get things out of your head

1. Click **"New Task"**
2. Set title, description
3. Choose priority: Now, Soon, Later
4. Add due date if needed
5. Link to project (optional)

### Projects
**Why:** Organize complex work

1. Click **"New Project"**
2. Set status: Active, Paused, Completed
3. Add tasks to the project
4. Track progress as tasks complete

### Events
**Why:** Never miss important dates

- Add events with dates/times
- Get SMS reminders 30 min before
- View your week at a glance

### Additional Features
- **Inventory** - Track belongings
- **Pets** - Pet care schedules
- **Recipes** - Save favorites
- **Documents** - Store references

## The Dashboard Connection

- **Tasks Today** tile shows daily count
- Overdue tasks appear in nudges
- AI tracks productivity patterns

## Tips

1. **Daily review** - Check task list each morning
2. **Use Now/Soon/Later** - Don't over-prioritize
3. **Link to projects** - See bigger picture
4. **Enable task SMS** - Due date reminders

fields.title: Medicine Tracking and Adherence
fields.summary: Never miss a dose with scheduled reminders, one-tap logging, and SMS quick-replies.
fields.content:
## Why Track Medicine?

Medication adherence is one of the most impactful health behaviorsâ€”and hardest to maintain. WLJ helps you:

- **Never miss a dose** - Visual schedules + SMS reminders
- **Build consistency** - Track adherence rates over time
- **Catch refills early** - Alerts before you run out
- **Inform your doctor** - Accurate adherence data

## Setting Up Medicines

1. Go to **Health > Medicine**
2. Click **"Add Medicine"**
3. Enter: Name, dose, frequency
4. Set schedule: days and times
5. Set refill alert threshold

## Daily Tracking

### One-Tap Check-Off
1. Visit **Health > Medicine**
2. See today's schedule with status
3. Tap to mark: **Taken**, **Missed**, or **Skipped**

### Status Badges
- ðŸŸ¢ Taken
- ðŸŸ¡ Pending
- ðŸ”´ Overdue
- âšª Skipped

## SMS Reminders

Enable in **Preferences > SMS**:
- Get texts at scheduled times
- Reply **D** = Done
- Reply **R** = Remind in 5 min
- Reply **N** = Skip

No app neededâ€”just text back.

## Refill Tracking

1. Enter current quantity and pills per dose
2. System calculates days remaining
3. Alert triggers at your threshold
4. Click **"Request Refill"** when low
5. Click **"Refill Received"** when filled

## Adherence Stats

- Daily, weekly, monthly views
- Per-medicine breakdown
- Identify which meds you miss most

## Tips

1. **Enable SMS** - Harder to ignore
2. **Consistent times** - Same time daily
3. **Log immediately** - Don't wait
4. **Review weekly** - Spot patterns

fields.title: Camera Scan: Quick AI-Powered Entry
fields.summary: Photograph food, medicine, or documents for instant data entry.
fields.content:
## Why Use Camera Scan?

Camera Scan removes friction from logging. Point and shoot instead of typing:

- **Food** - Photo â†’ Nutrition data pre-filled
- **Medicine** - Photo â†’ Medication added
- **Documents** - Photo â†’ Categorized and saved

### The Time Savings

Manual food entry: 2-3 minutes
Camera scan: 10 seconds

Over a week: **30+ minutes saved** on food alone.

## How to Use

1. Click **Scan** in navigation
2. Grant camera permission
3. Point at item
4. Tap **capture**
5. Wait 2-5 seconds for AI analysis
6. Review pre-filled form
7. Save

## What AI Detects

| Item Type | What Happens |
|-----------|-------------|
| Packaged Food | Brand identified, nutrition looked up |
| Home-Cooked | Portions estimated, macros calculated |
| Nutrition Label | All data extracted |
| Medicine Bottle | Name, dose, pharmacy extracted |
| Document | Categorized, saved |

## Food Recognition

### Packaged Foods
- AI identifies brand and product
- Looks up actual nutrition facts
- Returns all macros and serving size

### Home-Cooked/Restaurant
- Estimates portion visually
- Uses databases for ingredients
- Good approximations, not exact

## Tips for Best Results

1. **Good lighting** - Natural light
2. **Clear focus** - Readable text
3. **Include labels** - Best accuracy
4. **Whole plate visible** - For portions
5. **Steady hand** - Avoid blur

## Privacy

- Images processed and deleted
- Encrypted transmission
- No sharing
- Optionalâ€”use manual entry instead

fields.title: The Personal Assistant
fields.summary: Get AI-powered daily priorities, trend analysis, and proactive guidance based on all your data.
fields.content:
## Why Use the Personal Assistant?

The Personal Assistant isn't a chatbot or cheerleaderâ€”it's a **task-focused guide**. Unlike the Dashboard (which shows data), the Assistant tells you **what to do next**.

## Dashboard vs Assistant

| Dashboard | Assistant |
|-----------|----------|
| Shows data | Interprets data |
| Celebrates wins | Focuses on gaps |
| Passive | Proactive |
| General insights | Specific priorities |

## Features

### Daily Priorities
Each morning, the Assistant suggests:
1. What needs attention today
2. Ordered by importance (faith first if enabled)
3. Completable with one click

### Opening Message
Brief daily check-in based on:
- Your current state
- What matters today
- Your coaching style

### Trend Analysis
- **Weekly** - Last 7 days patterns
- **Monthly** - Bigger-picture trends
- **Drift Detection** - When actions don't match intentions

### Reflection Prompts
Personalized journaling suggestions based on:
- Recent activity
- Gaps in tracking
- Goals you've set

## Priority Ordering (Faith-First)

If Faith enabled:
1. Faith items
2. Purpose items
3. Long-term goals
4. Commitments
5. Maintenance
6. Optional

## Enabling the Assistant

Requires extra consent (deeper data access):

1. **Preferences > AI Settings**
2. Enable **AI Features**
3. Enable **Personal Assistant**
4. Accept consent
5. Assistant appears in navigation

## What the Assistant Sees

- Journal entries and moods
- Health data and adherence
- Task completion
- Prayer requests (if Faith)
- Goal progress

**This is why separate consent is required.**

## Tips

1. **Check daily** - Morning priority review
2. **Complete promptly** - Mark done when finished
3. **Log consistently** - Better data = better suggestions
4. **Set clear Purpose** - AI needs to know intentions

fields.title: SMS Notifications Setup
fields.summary: Get text message reminders for medicine, tasks, events, and more with quick-reply actions.
fields.content:
## Why SMS?

App notifications are easy to ignore. Texts aren't. SMS ensures you:

- **Never miss medicine** - Texts at scheduled times
- **Stay on top of tasks** - Due date reminders
- **Remember events** - 30-minute advance notice
- **Respond quickly** - Reply to log without opening app

## The Quick Reply System

When you get a reminder, reply:
- **D** (Done) - Mark complete
- **R** (Remind) - 5 min later
- **N** (No/Skip) - Skip this one

No app needed. Just text back.

## Setting Up SMS

### Step 1: Add Phone
1. **Preferences > SMS Notifications**
2. Enter phone number
3. Click **"Send Verification Code"**
4. Enter 6-digit code

### Step 2: Enable SMS
1. Toggle **"Enable SMS Notifications"**
2. Accept SMS consent

### Step 3: Choose Categories
- âœ… Medicine reminders
- âœ… Medicine refill alerts
- âœ… Task due dates
- âœ… Event reminders
- âœ… Prayer reminders
- âœ… Fasting reminders

### Step 4: Quiet Hours
No texts during sleep:
- Set start (e.g., 10:00 PM)
- Set end (e.g., 7:00 AM)
- Reminders queue until end

## Notification Types

| Type | When | Example |
|------|------|----------|
| Medicine | Scheduled time | "Time for Metformin. Reply D/R/N" |
| Refill | Supply low | "3 days left: Metformin" |
| Task | Due date | "Due today: Buy groceries" |
| Event | 30 min before | "In 30 min: Doctor" |
| Prayer | Morning | "Prayer reminder" |
| Fasting | Window times | "Eating window opens at noon" |

## Tips

1. **Start with medicine** - Most impactful
2. **Set quiet hours** - Respect sleep
3. **Use reply codes** - Faster than app
4. **Check SMS history** - View sent messages in app
fields.keywords: sms, text, notifications, reminders, medicine, phone, verify, twilio, messages

fields.title: Nutrition and Food Tracking
fields.summary: Track what you eat to understand patterns and hit your calorie and macro goals.
fields.content:
## Why Track Nutrition?

You can't manage what you don't measure. Nutrition tracking helps you:

- **Understand patterns** - When do you overeat?
- **Hit goals** - See exact calorie/macro progress
- **Identify triggers** - Connect eating to mood/stress
- **Make informed choices** - Know impact before eating

## The Dashboard Connection

Your nutrition data powers:
- **Today's Nutrition** summary with progress bars
- AI insights about eating patterns
- Personal Assistant nudges when off-target
- Weekly trend analysis

## How to Log Food

### Method 1: Camera Scan (Fastest)
1. Click **Scan**
2. Point at food or label
3. AI identifies and estimates
4. Save pre-filled entry

### Method 2: Quick Add
1. **Nutrition > Quick Add**
2. Enter name and basics
3. Save quickly

### Method 3: Full Entry
1. **Add Food Entry**
2. All nutritional details
3. Meal type, location, pace
4. Hunger/fullness levels

## Tracking Details

- **Meal Types:** Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snack
- **Location:** Home, Restaurant, Work, Travel
- **Eating Pace:** Rushed, Normal, Slow/Mindful
- **Hunger/Fullness:** 1-5 scale

## Setting Goals

In **Preferences > Weight & Nutrition Goals**:

1. Daily Calorie Goal
2. Macro Split (Protein/Carbs/Fat %)
3. Presets: Balanced, High Protein, Low Carb, Keto

Dashboard shows progress bars once set.

## Tips

1. **Log before eating** - Easier to remember
2. **Use Camera Scan** - AI does the work
3. **Don't aim for perfection** - Estimates beat nothing
4. **Review weekly** - Daily variation is normal
5. **Create custom foods** - For common meals
